name: docex
postCreateCommand: bash -lc 'python -m venv .venv && .venv/bin/python -m pip install --upgrade pip && if [ -f requirements.txt ]; then .venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt; fi && .venv/bin/pip install -e .'

postAttachCommand.verify: bash -lc "python -c 'import sys; print(\"python:\", sys.executable); import webapp; print(\"webapp:\", webapp.__file__)'"
